sentences.en: In the mass production era multinational firms tended to centralize their operations.
sentences.cn: 在大规模生产的时代，跨国公司往往实行集权化经营。

sentences.en: It must decide whether to delegate authority to subsidiaries or centralize.
sentences.cn: 它必须决定是委授权力给公司,还是采取集中办法.

sentences.en: One thing NIS does is to centralize E - mail sorting.
sentences.cn: NIS所做的事情之一便是 电子邮件 分类集中化.

sentences.en: Ordinary triangular whorl root stress centralize and influence the fatigue life of the bolt seriously.
sentences.cn: 普通三角形螺纹根部应力集中较大,严重影响了螺栓的疲劳寿命.

sentences.en: Orientation of LPM is centralize in manufacturing, Orientation of industry is developing of three category products.
sentences.cn: 企业定位为集中精力发展制造业, 产业定位为发展三大产品.

sentences.en: plans to centralize the company’s U.S. activities
sentences.cn: 公司对在美国的业务活动进行统一管理的计划

sentences.en: So we centralize our study on interaction of executive incentive, stockholding and firm performance.
sentences.cn: 因此我们集中研究了上市公司高管薪酬 、 高管持股与企业业绩之间的交互作用.

sentences.en: The dynamic brand concentrating strategy, also called brand contracting and centralize strategy, is precious.
sentences.cn: 企业实施品牌的动态窄化战略, 即品牌收缩与集中战略, 更加难能可贵.

sentences.en: The result shows that numerical - control machining can achieve working procedure centralize, increase machining precision and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,数控加工可实现零件加工的工序集中, 有效提高零件的加工精度和加工效率.

sentences.en: These risks centralize mainly in drilling and completion operation ( inclusion workover ).
sentences.cn: 这些风险又主要集中在钻、完井 ( 包括修井 ) 两个主要环节上.

sentences.en: To centralize the external communication and international cooperation affairs in the sector of securities and futures.
sentences.cn: 归口管理证券期货行业的对外交往和国际合作事务.

words.tran_cn: 固定于中心的；在中心的
中央集权制；中央集权主义
中央交换机；市话交换分局
温和主义，中间路线；中间派的政策
中立派议员；中间派议员
集中（centre的过去分词）；把…置于中央
使集中；使成为…的中心；使集权

trans.tran_cn: 使权力中央化，对…集权控制
trans.tran_en: to organize the control of a country, organization, or system so that everything is done or decided in one place
to organize the control of a country, organization, or system so that everything is done or decided in one place
